document_data.name: Hessar
document_data.mainbody: '''Hessar''' was a [[Calishite]] [[human]] [[shade]] [[monk]] and member of the [[Eye of Justice]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|1131}}
document_data.Description: Hessar was muscular and had yellow eyes.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|1146}} He had a black moon symbol of [[Shar]] tattooed on his wrist{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|1966}} and the Eye of Justice's symbol of an eye and gauntlet tattooed on his palm.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|1976}}
document_data.Abilities: Although he was a [[monk]], he possessed some [[magic|magical]] abilities.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|1131}}
document_data.History:
[[Levia Shadewalker]] sometimes joked lustfully with Hessar about taking a step further.

Hessar kept his true nature hidden from most members of the Eye. Some who knew him suspected he was an agent of the [[shadovar]], but in fact he was working for the [[vampire]] lord [[Kirenkirsalai]]. After he double-crossed Kirenkirsalai one too many times in [[1480 DR]], the vampire broke Hessar's neck and left him for the newly made vampire [[Vaelis]] to feed on.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|5353}}
